Platform.Title: Listeria monocytogenes strain F2365 5.6K
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: The custom oligonucleotide microarray is synthesized on a semiconductor using an electrochemical synthesis process. Each oligonucleotide probe (spot) is synthesized on a platinum electrode that is independently controlled by the synthesizerâ€™s computer. Synthesis is based on established phosphoramidite chemistry and occurs at thousands of sites simultaneously according to a computer algorithm that activates only specified electrodes. Since physical photolithographic masks, mechanical micromirrors, or inkjet technologies are not involved in the process, all probes can be easily changed without extra time or cost. The oligonucleotides are synthesized in a proprietary porous reaction layer that coats the surface of the semiconductor, and acts to covalently attach the oligonucleotide to the surface of the chip.

Sample.Title: mutant vs. wild type bio rep 1 tech rep 1

Channel.Growth-Protocol: Listeria monocytogenes Scott A mutant and wild type grown to O.D.600 0.7 to 0.8
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using Ambion RiboPure-Bacterial Kit following manufacture's instructions
Channel.Label: cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: dye swap labeling using Alexa 555(cy3) and Alexa 647 (cy5)

Channel.Growth-Protocol: Listeria monocytogenes Scott A mutant and wild type grown to O.D.600 0.7 to 0.8
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA extracted using Ambion RiboPure-Bacterial Kit following manufacture's instructions
Channel.Label: cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: dye swap labeling using Alexa 555(cy3) and Alexa 647 (cy5)

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: according to CustomArray 12K microarray protocols provided by Combimatrix
Sample.Scan-Protocol: at 5-um resolutions by the ScanArray ExpressHT microarray scanner
Sample.Description: normalized log2 ratios of mutant/wild type
Sample.Data-Processing: normalized using median over entire array, log2 of Red signal/ Green signal. BRB-ArrayTools software was used.

Column.Name: VALUE
Column.Description: normalized log2 ratio representing mutant/wild type

Series.Title: Gene expression profiling of a pressure-tolerant Listeria monocytogenes Scott A ctsR deletion mutant
Series.Summary: Transcriptional profling of a Listeria monocytogenes under pressure comparing ctsR mutant and wild type
Series.Overall-Design: one condition (pressure 450 Moa, 3min) experiment, mutant vs. wild type, 2 biological replicates, two technical replicates
